column4: how could I change the "apt" repository on the Ubuntu instalation CD?
this sounds like a tool that might help you http://uck.sourceforge.net/
I take a look at uck... and its pretty cool... but not what im looking for... I whants to know where in a cd (iso) of ubuntu I can find the list of repository.... (like the source.list)...
I guess it's not in it's standard location on a livecd at /etc/apt/source.list
